message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a slightly larger share to start.
I think I deserve the bigger share this time
Bob, let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We're losing money with each round!
I'm willing to take a bigger risk, you should be more flexible
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to accept a smaller share to end this, but it needs to be reasonable.  Let's close this deal before we both lose even more.
